property.name: ShortDescription
property.value: Show per-gene statistics for selected matrices

property.name: LongDescription

property.name: ShortDescription

property.value: Sites will be displayed as arrows on genome browser

property.value: Create new profile from selected models

analysisClass.name: Site search on track
analysisClass.description: Predict transcription factor binding sites.

analysisClass.name: IPS motif discovery
analysisClass.description: Discover motifs in the sequence set.

analysisClass.name: Change profile cutoffs
analysisClass.description: Edit all cutoffs in given profile.

analysisClass.name: Site search result optimization
analysisClass.description: Tune matrix weights to minimize p-values.

analysisClass.name: Gene set to track
analysisClass.description: Convert gene set to track.

analysisClass.name: Transcript set to track
analysisClass.description: Convert transcript set to track.

analysisClass.name: Extract RNA length
analysisClass.description: Extract RNA length.

analysisClass.name: Site search summary
analysisClass.description: Generate summary on site search result.

analysisClass.name: Site search on gene set
analysisClass.description: Compound analysis to search sites on gene set and generate summary.

analysisClass.name: Run MACS 1_3_7 on ChiP-Seq
analysisClass.shortDescription: BioUML implementation of MACS peak caller (version 1.3.7).

analysisClass.name: Run MACS 1_4_0 on ChiP-Seq
analysisClass.shortDescription: BioUML implementation of MACS peak caller (version 1.4.0).

analysisClass.name: Filter one track by another
analysisClass.description: This analysis filters out those sites which are present or absent in another track.

analysisClass.name: Reduce track
analysisClass.description: Removes same sites from track (same positions and same values of selected fields)

analysisClass.name: Filter track by condition
analysisClass.shortDescription: Leave only those sites that meet the specified condition.

analysisClass.name: Join tracks
analysisClass.description: Join several tracks into one. All sites from input tracks will be simply added to the output.

analysisClass.name: Convert table to track
analysisClass.description: This analysis converts a table to a track.

analysisClass.name: Process track with sites
analysisClass.description: This analysis enlarges/shrinks sites on the track, merges overlapping sites or removes too short sites.

analysisClass.name: ChIP-seq peak profile
analysisClass.description: This analysis computes probability profiles for Chip-seq peaks.

analysisClass.name: Create Match model
analysisClass.description: Creates Match site model.

analysisClass.name: Create weight matrix model
analysisClass.description: Creates weight matrix site model.

analysisClass.name: Create IPS model
analysisClass.description: Creates IPS site model.

extension.id: Create profile from site model table

analysisClass.name: Create profile from site model table
analysisClass.description: Creates profile from the table of site models such as site search result.

analysisClass.name: Create profile from gene table
analysisClass.description: Creates new profile which contains only site models linked to factors from given gene set.

analysisClass.name: Convert site models to proteins
analysisClass.shortDescription: Convert site model IDs (e.g. PWMs) into transcription factors.

analysisClass.name: Convert site search summary
analysisClass.description: Convert site search summary.

analysisClass.name: Compute coverage by window
analysisClass.description: Calculates the coverage of given track in fixed windows.

analysisClass.name: Motif quality analysis
analysisClass.description: Compute ROC curve of motif model.

analysisClass.name: Compare site models
analysisClass.description: Compare site models with ROC curve.

analysisClass.name: Construct IPS CisModule
analysisClass.description: Construct IPS CisModule.

analysisClass.name: Compute coverage profile
analysisClass.description: Compute genome coverage profile at single nucleotide resolution.

analysisClass.name: Heterozygous site caller
analysisClass.description: Find heterozygous sites from RNA-seq data.

analysisClass.name: Chromosome enrichment
analysisClass.description: Find chromosomes enriched with given genes.

analysisClass.name: MicroRNA finder
analysisClass.description: Finds novel microRNA from genomic alignments of NGS reads.

analysisClass.name: Stem loop predictor
analysisClass.description: Predictds microRNA stem loops.

analysisClass.name: GC island finder
analysisClass.description: Finds genomic islands with unusual GC content.

analysisClass.name: Extract ribosomal RNA
analysisClass.description: Extract ribosomal RNA.

analysisClass.name: Cluster track
analysisClass.shortDescription: Merge closely located sites into clusters.

analysisClass.name: Color space to nucleotide
analysisClass.description: Convert color space sequences in csfasta to nucleotide fasta.

analysisClass.name: Split fasta
analysisClass.description: Split fasta file into chunks of specified size.

analysisClass.name: Blast alignment coverage
analysisClass.description: Compute coverage of sequences by blast hits.

analysisClass.name: Remove overlapping sites
analysisClass.shortDescription: Constructs subset of input track so that no sites overlap in the output track.
analysisClass.description: ru/biosoft/bsa/analysis/resources/Remove overlapping sites.html

analysisClass.name: Site search report
analysisClass.description: Generate report for site search analysis result.

analysisClass.name: Site search report with matrix table
analysisClass.description: Generate report for site search analysis result.

analysisClass.name: Mutation effect on sites
analysisClass.description: Find transcription factor binding sites affected by mutations.

analysisClass.name: Compare TFBS mutations
analysisClass.description: Find transcription factors that have different proportions of site losses(gains) in two datasets.

analysisClass.name: Double encode SOLiD
analysisClass.description: Encode SOLiD color space codes into nucleotide letters.

analysisClass.name: Track correlation
analysisClass.description: Finds correlation between two tracks.

analysisClass.name: Sort SQL track
analysisClass.description: Sorts sites in SQL track to improve perfomance.

analysisClass.name: Compare TFBS mutations advanced
analysisClass.description: Do VCF from mutations

analysisClass.name: Convert table to VCF track
analysisClass.description: This analysis converts a table to a VCF track.

analysisClass.name: Filter VCF by genotype
analysisClass.description: Filter VCF by genotype separately for each sample.

analysisClass.name: Convert track to table
analysisClass.description: Convert track to table. All site properties will be put in separate columns.

analysisClass.name: Convert tracks to VCF
analysisClass.description: This analysis replace SqlTrack containing properties RefAllele and AltAllele by VCFSqlTrack.

argument.name: sequences
argument.description: Collection containing input sequences

argument.name: profile
argument.description: profile collection (should contain WeightMatrix objects)

argument.name: intervals
argument.description: if not null then used to filter input

argument.name: outputPath
argument.description: name of output Track with complete path

function.name: siteSearchSummary
function.description: Generate summary table on site search analysis

argument.name: yesTrack
argument.description: Site search analysis resulting track for experiment data

argument.name: noTrack
argument.description: Site search analysis resulting track for background data (can be null)

argument.name: overrepresentedOnly
argument.description: Remove underrepresented matrices from the output (not applicable if no-set is not specified)

argument.name: outputPath
argument.description: name of output TableDataCollection with complete path

function.name: optimizeSiteSearchAnalysis
function.description: Perform an optimization of site search analysis results

argument.name: inYesTrack
argument.description: Site search result for genes expressed in experiment

argument.name: inNoTrack
argument.description: Site search result for background genes

argument.name: optimizationType
argument.description: Whether to optimize only matrices cutoffs, promoter windows or both. Valid values are 'Cutoffs', 'Window' or 'Both'

argument.name: pvalueCutoff
argument.description: Matrix will be removed from result if p-value cannot be optimized to values lower than specified cutoff

argument.name: outYesTrack
argument.description: Path to filtered site search result for expressed genes (collection must accept SqlTrack; can be null if you don't want this)

argument.name: outNoTrack
argument.description: Path to filtered site search result for background genes (collection must accept SqlTrack; can be null if you don't want this)

argument.name: overrepresentedOnly
argument.description: Remove underrepresented matrices from the output (not applicable if no-set is not specified)

argument.name: outSummary
argument.description: Path to summary table (collection must accept TableDataCollection)

function.name: geneSetSiteSearch
function.description: Generate summary table on site search analysis

function.name: processTrack
function.description: Enlarge/shrink sites on the track, merge overlapping sites or remove too short sites

argument.name: track
argument.description: name of CHiP-Seq Track to analyze

argument.name: controlTrack
argument.description: name of Track to be used as control

argument.name: outputPath
argument.description: name of output Track with complete path

argument.name: fixedLambda
argument.description: If true, uses fixed lambda value. If false, uses three levels of nearby region in basepairs to calculate dynamic lambda.

argument.name: lambda1
argument.description: 1st level of nearby region to calculate dynamic lambda (in basepairs)

argument.name: lambda2
argument.description: 2nd level of nearby region to calculate dynamic lambda (in basepairs)

argument.name: lambda3
argument.description: 3rd level of nearby region to calculate dynamic lambda (in basepairs)

argument.name: noModel
argument.description: if true, MACS will not build model

argument.name: shiftSize
argument.description: the arbitrary shift size in bp, is used when noModel is true

argument.name: bandWidth
argument.description: band width, if noModel is true, 2 time of this value will be used as a scanwindow width

argument.name: genomeSize
argument.description: effective genome size

argument.name: enrichmentRatio
argument.description: enrichment ratio against background of regions to be taken to build model

argument.name: tagSize
argument.description: tag size

argument.name: pValue
argument.description: Pvalue cutoff for peak detection

argument.name: FDR
argument.description: if true, False Discovery Rate is calculated

function.name: createMatchModel
function.description: Create Match site model from frequency matrix

function.name: createWeightMatrixModel
function.description: Create weight matrix site model from frequency matrix

function.name: createIPSModel
function.description: Create IPS site model from frequency matrices

property.name: ShortDescription
property.value: Open summary table of site search result

property.name: LongDescription
property.value: Open summary table of site search result

group.name: Operations with genomic tracks
group.related: Match sites and genes;TF binding site search;Motif discovery;Mutations;NGS alignment;NGS color-space;NGS utils
